root.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battlefield Record U.C.0081
root.description: This game supports up to 8 players via the PlayStation Network.A spiritual successor to Lost War Chronicles. DLCOn 17th of September 2009 there is 2 DLC from Japan PSN, there are Mobile Suit FA-78-3 and RX-81AS. Each cost 300 Yen FA-78-3 FA-78-3 RX-81AS RX-81AS
